attributes.action: the people of the united kingdom have no confidence in the present government
attributes.additional_details: We the people of the united kingdom are being victimized by this present government in favor of illegal criminal migrants and minority groups
attributes.background: This  government needs to be dissolved

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence. 
 
If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that. 

You may wis to sign this petition which calls for a general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
